attributes.action: Remove rishi Sunak as prime minister off the uk
attributes.additional_details: Has there only doing it as the new papers want the breed banning they should keep the breed but give the owners who dogs bite a prison sentence instead off a slap on the had
attributes.background: Remove rishi from on power and stop him from banning xl bullys

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
